summary.event: 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025)
summary.description: ICSME is a premier conference for researchers and practitioners involved in software maintenance and evolution.
program_highlights: Cutting-edge research on software evolution, maintenance, and analysis
Invited keynotes by international thought leaders
Panels, tool demos, and community activities
Networking opportunities with global researchers, practitioners, and students
Conference reception and cultural activities in Auckland

student_volunteers.description: Opportunity to get involved, meet mentors, and experience the conference from the inside.

travel_support.availability: Travel support for US-based attendees available via NSF funding.

logistics_and_sustainability.discount_codes: Available for nearby hotels and international travel upon registration.
logistics_and_sustainability.accessibility: Arrangements being made for inclusivity of all attendees.

networking_opportunity.engagement_with_researchers: Attendees can connect with NZ's software engineering researchers.

summary.sponsors: IEEE Computer Society, support from IEEE TCSE and various research organizations
